data.Approach: contains a pure perl approach to pathname resolution, as
data.Namespace: extends File::Spec to links, with same 00 interface.
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Namespace: extends File::Spec to links, with same 00 interface.

    Approach: contains a pure perl approach to pathname resolution, as
    in Cwd; there is similar code to resolve linked filenames in FindBin
    but that module does not provide access to that functionality.
